messages.title: Claim a different future
messages.content: The government’s cuts have hurt us all, growth is slow and real wages are down. I will stand up for the many in Newark Constituency, not the few.

messages.title: Why I am backing Chantal Lee
messages.content: I know that Chantal Lee understands the struggles facing families today. She is the strong local voice that Newark needs.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A Tory Brexit will not work for you
keyPolicies.policyDescription: A Tory Brexit would risk our future by putting jobs and rights at work at stake. Labour would secure access to the single market and protect working rights.

mentions.candidate: Chantal Lee believes in a society for the many, not the few.

issues.brexitEurope: A Tory Brexit would risk our future by putting jobs and rights at work at stake. Labour would secure access to the single market and protect working rights.
issues.economy: The government’s cuts have hurt us all, growth is slow and real wages are down.

housing.content: Will your family have a home tomorrow?

leaflet.personalStatement: I believe in a society for the many, not the few, and that’s what I want to fight for in Parliament.

endorsements.endorsement: I know that Chantal Lee understands the struggles facing families today. She is the strong local voice that Newark needs.

images.caption: Chantal Lee - Your candidate for Newark Constituency
